title: Sleep Headphones, 3D Sleep Mask Bluetooth Wireless Music Eye Mask, LC-dolida Sleeping Headphones for Side Sleepers Sleep Mask with Bluetooth Headphones Ultra-Thin Stereo Speakers Perfect for Sleeping
descriptions:
Introducing the Sleep Headphones, 3D Sleep Mask Bluetooth Wireless Music Eye Mask by LC-dolida! This remarkable product combines the functionality of sleep headphones, a Bluetooth sleep mask, and a sleep eye mask into one convenient package.

With the latest Bluetooth version 5.2, you can enjoy a wireless range of up to 45 feet, allowing you to connect to most Bluetooth-enabled devices effortlessly. Experience the ultimate sound quality with HD Stereo Sound, immersing yourself in high-fidelity audio like never before.

The Sleep Headphones feature an impressive battery life, with a playtime of 8-10 hours and a quick charging time of only 1-2 hours. This means you can enjoy uninterrupted music or soothing sounds throughout the night.

Designed for maximum comfort, the 3D contoured eye mask provides a perfect fit for side sleepers. The adjustable strap ensures a secure and customized fit, while the zero pressure design on the eyes ensures optimal comfort during sleep. The mask is made from memory foam and soft fabric, providing a cool and comfortable experience. It is also breathable and hypoallergenic, suitable for those with sensitive skin.

The Sleep Headphones offer perfect light blockage, thanks to the sunglasses-shaped eye mask design. It effectively blocks out light and prevents light leakage, creating a dark and peaceful environment for sleep.

This product is ideal for a variety of conditions, including insomnia, air travel, meditation, yoga, migraine headaches, and dry-eye sufferers. It is suitable for men, women, teens, girls, boys, dads, and moms, making it a versatile gift option.

Whether it's for Christmas, Valentine's Day, Halloween, Easter, a birthday, Mother's Day, Father's Day, or Teacher's Day, the Sleep Headphones make for a cool tech gadget and a unique gift choice.
